> [progi](#comment_26_17KQehVm2u5r4GAjqkC3jRcxepzK6ri51W): There is no financial gain in it. 

I think posting a bounty on a bounty website about what is needed to be fixed will create an incentive
(You can create two bounties, one on a website that accept credit cards and one on a bounty website/d-app that accept cryptos for those who are in countries that prefer to contribute anonymously - but etherium bounty d-apps is not an option, gas fees are too high)
